name: Richter10.2 Media Group
overview:
Richter10.2 is a full service web media PR agency.

Richter10.2 is a new type of PR agency. Our goal is to consistently deliver new reaches to our clients that improves their sales. Our approach and strategy is about people and relationships. We make introductions for our clients with their target audience to smartly develop new business avenues for them that have a strong impact on their bottom-line. We donâ€™t care about speaking to everyone and anyone. We donâ€™t care about marketing. We donâ€™t care about advertising. We CARE about relationships and making meaningful introductions to the right people for our clients that helps our clients attain their goals and grow as a company. We take our clients from where they are to where they want to be through building strategic awareness and making them a known quantity with their target audience. We could be considered the go to company for making connections and introductions to the right people. Our only job is to help our clients grow and we use every tool we have available to make that happen.

milestones.description: Richter10.2 partners with UK PR firm, BuzzWord PR to offer the Social Media Press Kit to the UK market

Today, we launched the new Social Media Press Kit platform for $9.95/month. 

You can now simply go to http://whywebpr.com and click "Get Started" to get your own Social Media Press Kit and start your personal online brand and presence.
